version_description:
Over the last 2 months, we re-designed 3rder and optimized user experience. Finally, we are now fully equipped inside and out! Upgrade now and give your swingers life a new start! Welcome to contact us: support@3somes.org
1. New design adopted
2. Chat and loading speed improved. No more waiting!
3. New filter added in Moment module
4. App breakdown caused by personal info editing restored
4. Other minor bugs fixed

- 3rder members can resend messages if failed
- Optimize the photo displaying at the more information page

We continously improve the 3rder app to make it better for you. This new update includes the following changes:
1. Bug fixed in uploading avatar
2. Logic optimized in user album management
3. Display in Chat module optimized
4. New design adopted in payment page

If you have any problem, feel free to let us know!

1. Display bug fixed in IOS14
2. New design adopted in Connection module
3. Other bugs fixed

This new update includes the following improvements:
1. Privacy Setting added. Members will be able to hide profiles from unwanted people.
2. Profile Visibility added.
3. User experience improved.
4. Some minor bugs fixed.
Feel free to let us know if anyproblem!
